item.title: Prompt Library
item.description: Date/time handling has always been messy in code, so I’m letting Claude handle the chaos of parsing freeform scheduling requests and turning them into structured JSON. Did I cover most ways dates and times are mentioned when people schedule meetings? system_prompt = Extract all temporal expressions from the text, including partial, informal, or business-context information.
